# lightingBitMask

**Instance Property**

A mask that defines how the tile map is lit by light nodes in the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var lightingBitMask: UInt32 { get set }
```

```swift
var lightingBitMask: UInt32 { get set }
```

## Discussion

To determine whether this sprite is lit by a light node, the sprite’s `lightingBitMask` property is tested against the light’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/categoryBitMask] property by performing a logical AND operation. If the comparison results in a nonzero value, the sprite is lit by this light.

The default value is 0x00000000 (all bits cleared).
